title.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, Feb. 17, 1933. Slovak Political Club Will Sponsor a Masquerade

div.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, Feb. 17, 1933. SLOVAK POLITICAL CLUB WILL SPONSOR A MASQUERADE

body.p: The Slovak American Political Club is sponsoring a masquerade dance, to be held February 28, in the Balek Hall, 717 W. 17th Street. The entire Slovak public is invited to attend.

The committee promises prizes for all participants who appear in masquerade costumes. Mr. Zborovan's orchestra will play. Refreshments will be served. The committee, therefore, is predicting that the participants will have an enjoyable time.
